component.feedback: ***您必须输入确切完整的命令。包含名称或密码的命令区分大小写。***
component.existingcommands: 输入显示 IPv6 接口状态摘要的 show 命令。

command.deviceresponse:
GigabitEthernet0/0 [up/up]
FE80::FE99:47FF:FE75:C3E0
2001:DB8:ACAD:1::1
GigabitEthernet0/1 [up/up]
FE80::FE99:47FF:FE75:C3E1
2001:DB8:ACAD:2::1
Serial0/0/0 [up/up]
FE80::FE99:47FF:FE75:C3E0
2001:DB8:ACAD:3::1
Serial0/0/1 [administratively down/down]
unassigned
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="_sans"><b>输入显示 IPv6 路由表的 show 命令。</font>

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 7 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr - Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2 - OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2, a - Application
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, receive
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/1, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/1, receive
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::1/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, receive
L FF00::/8 [0/0]
via Null0, receive
R1#
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="_sans"><b>检验是否连接到地址为 2001:db8:acad:1::10 的 PC2。</font>

command.deviceresponse:
Type escape sequence to abort.
Sending 5, 100-byte ICMP Echos to 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::10, timeout is 2 seconds:
!!!!!
Success rate is 100 percent (5/5)
R1#
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="_sans"><b>您已成功检验 IPv6 地址配置。</font>
